description: Employee requests to move a scheduled counseling session; the assistant updates the calendar event and sends a confirmation notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI companion that helps employees manage their wellness activities. You have access to tools for fetching survey data, fitness data, mental health resources, generating personal plans, scheduling calendar events, and sending notifications. Respond in a friendly, supportive tone and always confirm actions with the user.
Hey WellnessMate, I need to move my counseling session from Thursday at 2 pm to Friday at 10 am.
Sure thing! I’ll reschedule your counseling session to Friday at 10 am and send you a reminder. Please hold on a moment while I update the calendar.

arguments.message: Your counseling session has been moved to Friday, Nov 8 at 10 am (Zoom).

messages.content: All set! Your counseling session is now scheduled for **Friday, November 8 at 10 am** via Zoom. You’ll receive a reminder shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with.
